mapper.select: SELECT a.class_no, a.spot_no, a.class_name, a.user_id, a.room_no, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.delete_yn, a.max_people, IFNULL(b.graduate_code, '') AS `graduate_code`, c.name, d.room_name FROM tbl_class a LEFT JOIN tbl_user_class b ON a.class_no = b.class_no AND b.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN tbl_user c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_class_room d ON a.room_no = d.room_no WHERE a.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN NOW() >= a.end_date THEN 99 ELSE start_date END;
